Name: Chimaera

SetupTraits.Name: Chimaera Heads
SetupTraits.Description: Determine the three heads that the Chimaera has. Roll a d10 3 times, reroll repeats, or pick 3.

BodyParts.Name: Monstrous Heads
BodyParts.Description:
Heads each have 1/3 of the Chimaera's max HP, rounded up.
The Chimaera has three heads, chosen or rolled for from the following list, each unique. Each head has a unique set of powers, counts as an ally for Pack Tactics, shares the chimaera's space, is separately targetable, and has its own hit points. Statuses affect only one head at a time. Only one head is targetable at a time, even if an attack has area of effect. Damage that 'spills over' on one head is lost.
Each time the Chimaera takes a turn, it takes a turn with only one of its heads. A different head must act from the last head that acted, until there is only one head left. The Chimaera is only defeated when all three heads are defeated.

Actions.Name: Pounce
Actions.Description: The Chimaera flies 5 spaces. Characters under or adjacent to it when it lands are shoved 1 space and take [D] as an area effect.

PhasesDescription: Each time the Chimaera loses a head, it's phase changes. The recharge for its heads' abilities depend on phase, and only roll for a head's abilities on turns that it takes.

Phases.Name: Three Heads
Phases.Description: The recharges on all the head abilities are 6.

Phases.Name: Two Heads
Phases.Description: The Chimaera's heads are sturdy. The recharges on all its head's abilities are 4+.

Traits.Name: Feral Rage
Traits.Description: The Chimaera's remaining head gains +1 action and becomes unstoppable. All its abilities recharge on a 2+.

Traits.Name: Lion's Pride
Traits.Description: At the end of its turn, gains vigilance 1. Can intercept attacks against other heads.

Actions.Name: Roar
Actions.Description: Adjacent characters are shoved 1, then must save or become dazed.

Traits.Name: Bull's Fortitude
Traits.Description: All heads are Sturdy while the Bull head is alive.

Actions.Name: Headbutt
Actions.Effect: The Chimaera can dash 2 spaces before making this attack.

Actions.Name: Charge
Actions.Description: The Bull marks a character in range 8. At the end of that character's turn, if they're still marked, the chimaera charges towards them by the shortest route possible, with phasing. That character and characters the chimaera passes through must save or take 2[D] and be shoved 3 away from it, or 1[D] on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Toxic Bite
Actions.Effect: The character is marked. While marked, they lose all vigor at the start of their turn and cannot gain vigor.

Actions.Name: Poison Spit
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 takes 2 piercing damage and is poisoned. Poisoned characters take 4 piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Poison Breath
Actions.Effect: All characters in the area are poisoned.

Actions.Name: Tongue
Actions.Effect: The target is shoved 2 towards the chimaera.

Actions.Name: Noxious Venom
Actions.Description: All heads gain counter until the end of the round. All adjacent characters to the chimaera are poisoned.

Actions.Name: Swallow Whole
Actions.Description: The Toad swallows an adjacent character, moving them into the chimaera's space, then gains vigor 1. While swallowed, the character's speed is 0, it can't be targeted, it takes 2[D] piercing damage at the start of its turn, and it can only target the Toad with abilities and actions. The Toad has resistance to all damage from any swallowed character, and can swallow only one character at at ime. When the Toad's vigor breaks, it vomits up all swallowed characters in adjacent spaces.

Actions.Name: Fireball
Actions.Blightboost: Becomes piercing and characters takes [D] again.

Actions.Name: Inhale
Actions.Description: The next action this head takes gains +1 boon and increases all areas of effect by 1.

Actions.Name: Pyroclast
Actions.Description: Characters in the area must save or take [D] and become stunned. Summon a height 3 spire of terrain in the area.

Actions.Name: Rake
Actions.Effect: Increase damage by [D] against blinded characters.

Actions.Name: Great Prowl
Actions.Description: The chimaera dashes 3 and gains stealth, and evasion while stealthed.

Actions.Name: Shadow Breath
Actions.Effect: Characters in the area must save or become blinded.

Traits.Name: Shield
Traits.Description: While the goat is alive, the Chimaera's heads have dodge.

Actions.Name: Cross Bolt
Actions.Effect: Attack target must save or become vulnerable.

Actions.Name: Polaris
Actions.Description: Mark a visible space. At the end of each turn past this one (foe or allied), roll a d6. On a 6, a meteor smashes into the space, inflicting [D] and frostbite to all characters within.

Actions.Name: Meteor
Actions.Description: All characters not in cover from the Chimarea must save or take 2 damage three times, or once on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Gaze
Actions.Description: Until the start of the Chicken's next turn, characters that attack the chicken or any of the other heads while the chicken is alive take +1 curse on their attacks. They can choose to take +1 boon instead but instead must save against Petrification.

Actions.Name: Petrification
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 becomes slowed. At the end of that character's next turn, they must save. On a failed save, they are encased in stone, becoming replaced with a destructible height 1 terrain piece instead of a character, with 10 hp. Until the terrain space is destroyed, they cannot take a turn. When it's destroyed, they are returned to the battlefield in the space they left and can take a turn as normal.

Actions.Name: Cold Feet
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 must save or an encasing of ice covers their feet, which is a summon sharing their space that can't move in any way. While encased, they have their speed reduced to 0 and become winded+. These effects only end if the ice is destroyed. The ice can be destroyed by taking any amount of damage.

Actions.Name: Freezing Breath
Actions.Effect: Characters are inflicted with frostbite. Frostbitten characters take +[D]. Winded characters are stunned.
